name: Market News Analysis
description: A Dataflow pipeline that analyzes financial news with Vertex AI.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub subscription
parameters.helpText: The Pub/Sub subscription to read messages from. Format: projects/<PROJECT_ID>/subscriptions/<SUBSCRIPTION_ID>

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to write results to. Format: <PROJECT_ID>:<DATASET_ID>.<TABLE_ID>

parameters.name: sentiment_images_bucket_name
parameters.label: Sentiment images bucket name
parameters.helpText: The GCS bucket to store generated sentiment chart icons in.

parameters.name: region
parameters.label: Region
parameters.helpText: The GCP region to run the Dataflow job in.
